nodes.text: The Cord-class starfighter was a model of fighter craft used by the clone trooper pilots of the Galactic Republic during the pan-galactic Clone Wars against the Confederacy of Independent Systems. They were available to the Republic Starfighter Corps early in the conflict, which started in 22 BBY, alongside other craft like V-19 Torrent starfighters.

Cord-class starfighters were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying game sourcebook published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019 for the Star Wars Roleplaying series of products. They first appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity in the 2002 young readers book Boba Fett: Crossfire by Terry Bisson.
